offer.title: helps teams move work forward.
offer.description: Collaborate, manage projects, and reach new productivity peaks. From high rises to the home office, the way your team works is unique—accomplish it all with Trello.

info.title: It’s more than work. It’s a way of working together.
info.description: Start with a Trello board, lists, and cards. Customize and expand with more features as your teamwork grows. Manage projects, organize tasks, and build team spirit—all in one place.

loginField.label: User name

passwordField.maxLength: Password can be max 12 characters long

titleField.label: Board title
titleField.minLength: Board title must be at least 3 characters long
titleField.maxLength: Board title can be max 20 characters long

notFound.title: Oops! 404 - PAGE NOT FOUND
notFound.p1: The page you are looking for might have been removed
notFound.p2: had its name changed or temporarily unavailable.

errorFallback.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errorFallback.p1: Brace yourself till we get the error fixed.
errorFallback.p2: You may also refresh the page or try again later.
